scenario_draft.description: As printing press technicians, you and Bob face a dilemma: whether to use eco-friendly ink, which is costlier but improves your reputation, or stick with cheaper ink. If both choose eco-friendly, costs are higher, but both gain a reputation boost. If one uses cheaper ink while the other goes eco-friendly, the former saves costs and gains clients. If both use cheaper ink, costs are minimized, but both lose out on attracting eco-conscious clients.
